Texts.Chs: 快出发！科技城的命运就靠你了！
Texts.Eng: Go now! The fate of Techno City lies in your hands!

Texts.Chs: 我听到了机械移动的声音，企鹅们快来了。
Texts.Eng: I hear the sounds of machinery up ahead; the penguins' leader draws close.

Texts.Chs: 我也想和你一同前往，可惜我必须留下来以防止最坏的情况发生。
Texts.Eng: I would go with you, but I have to stay to call for backup in case worst comes to worst.

Texts.Chs: 这真是一场激烈的战斗，毫无疑问，这场战争已快接近尾声。
Texts.Eng: That was an intense and invigorating battle; no doubt the end must be near.

Texts.Chs: 你好，朋友。我的名字是Girulian，正如你所想，我为SMASH而工作。
Texts.Eng: Well met, friend. My name is Girulian; as you might suspect by now, I am also a Guardian working with the SMASH unit.
